summary: Honolulu is the capital and biggest city of Hawaii. It's located on the island of OÊ»ahu and is known for its mix of different cultures. The city has a calm harbor, which is why its name means "sheltered harbor" in Hawaiian. Honolulu has been an important place since 1845 and became the capital of the Hawaiian Islands when Hawaii became a U.S. state in 1898. It's also famous for its role in World War II after the attack on Pearl Harbor. Today, many people visit Honolulu for its beautiful beaches and nice weather.
title: Honolulu
